1361410.name: Neith
1361410.description:
Neith is a free modular platform for productivity, note-taking, and everyday utilities. It brings together full-featured apps and quick-access widgets in one place, allowing you to build a workspace that adapts to your workflow. Each extension works independently but integrates seamlessly, creating a flexible and connected experience.

Work privately on your PC for free, or sync your workspace across devices if you choose.*

Neith’s extensions are divided into apps, full-featured productivity tools, and widgets, small utility tools for quick access. You can install exactly the tools you need.

*Optional cloud sync is available through a paid plan.

Full-featured apps for productivity, creativity, and organisation include:

  • Rich Text Editor: Write and format notes with ease

  • Kanban: Visual project and task management

  • Mind Map: Brainstorm and organise ideas

  • Shopping List: Manage groceries and tasks

  • Developer Tools: Snippets, JSON formatter, regex tester, and more

  • Diary: Journaling with reflection templates

  • Notes: Quick notes with a familiar, card-based layout

  • File Converter: Convert between multiple formats

  • Mood Board: Create visual mood boards

  • Todos: Manage tasks and to-dos

  • Video Bookmarker: Save and organise videos with timestamps

  • …and many more

Widgets include:

  • Date: Beautiful date and time display with timezone support

  • Egg Timer: Specialized timer for perfectly cooked eggs

  • Password Generator: Create secure passwords with customization options

  • Water Intake: Track daily water consumption with goals and reminders

  • World Clock: Display time in multiple timezones

  • …and many more

Neith is fully customisable and themeable, letting you express yourself while working. Choose from over 40 themes to create a workspace that reflects your style.

Q: Will Neith be available on other platforms?

A: Yes! Other platforms are coming, including a mobile version.

Q: Do I need to buy Neith or pay for it?

A: Neith is free to use and lets you work privately on your PC. Cloud sync is available if you choose to use it.

Q: Do I need an account to get started?

A: No. You can start using Neith immediately on your PC without creating an account.

Q: Will more apps and widgets come?

A: Yes! Neith is constantly evolving, and we’ll be adding new apps and widgets over time.

Q: Why release Neith on Steam?

A: Steam Early Access gives us a great way to reach users and gather feedback. You might encounter bugs along the way, and your input will help us build Neith together.
